person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The more than 1,260 students at the school are being given antibiotics as a precaution .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| more than 1,260 students at the school |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

|--------|
| more than 1,260 students |
| at the school |

Note: In this context, "students at the school" is considered as a collective noun referring to a group of individuals, and is therefore considered a single entity.
